name: Log Challenge
description: Log Challenge is an arcade game where you will have lots of fun in a 'quest for diamonds' action trying to collect as many diamonds as fast as you can moving through a dangerous plank while avoiding heavy swinging logs.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 960 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 750 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForceâ„¢ GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 750 MB available space
